name: Chase Ace Deluxe
description:
Chase Ace 2  was originally released in 1998, and re-released in 2007 as Chase Ace Deluxe.  This is the game, as it was, super action packed fun, including warts and bugs and all.

"this is a highly addictive game with legions of options, weapons, and replay value. It's a riot to play in either single or multiplayer mode"

- IGN, https://www.ign.com/articles/2000/05/04/chase-ace-2

For more information: chaseace.com

NOTE: 
THE GAME REQUIRES AN OLD-SCHOOL WINDOWS RIG TO RUN.  
(PROBABLY) WON'T RUN ON ANYTHING NEVER THAN WINDOWS NT. 

System Requirements: 

  • Windows 95/98 (or NT)
  • Pentium 200 Processor
  • 32MB RAM
  • 8MB PCI graphics card
  • 4X CD-DROM
  • 35 MB Hard Disk Space
  • Soundblaster with Direct X support
  • Keyboard 
  • Speakers

    • Biodome Games is the current day company owned by the original creators of the game.
